lead_paragraph: The Department of Veterans Affairs received letters calling for improved oversight of colleges that mislead students about the value of their programs while receiving G.I. Bill funds.

headline.print_headline: Veterans Groups Seek Crackdown on Deceptive Colleges
headline.main: Veterans Groups Seek a Crackdown on Deceptive Colleges

snippet: The Department of Veterans Affairs received letters calling for improved oversight of colleges that mislead students about the value of their programs while receiving G.I. Bill funds.
abstract: Several of largest veteran and military organizations in United States request that Veterans Affairs Department rein in colleges that prey on veterans with deceptive recruiting and other illicit practices, but receive millions in funding under G I Bill; career training and for-profit college industry in particular have been accused of exploiting veterans and others.
